org.apache.juneau.assertions

Class FluentListAssertion<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.assertions.Assertion
      • org.apache.juneau.assertions.FluentAssertion<R>
        • org.apache.juneau.assertions.FluentObjectAssertion<R>
          • org.apache.juneau.assertions.FluentCollectionAssertion<R>
            • org.apache.juneau.assertions.FluentListAssertion<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - The return type.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ListAssertion

    public class FluentListAssertion<R>
extends FluentCollectionAssertion<R>
    Used for fluent assertion calls against lists.

    • Method Detail

      • item

        public FluentObjectAssertion<R> item(int index)
        Returns an object assertion on the item specified at the specified index.

        If the list is null or the index is out-of-bounds, the returned assertion is a null assertion (meaning FluentObjectAssertion.exists() returns false).

        Parameters:
        index - The index of the item to retrieve from the list.
        Returns:
        A new assertion.

      • msg

        public FluentListAssertion<R> msg(String msg,
                                  Object... args)
        Description copied from class: Assertion
        Allows to to specify the assertion failure message.

        String can contain "{msg}" to represent the original message.

        Overrides:
        msg in class FluentCollectionAssertion<R>
        Parameters:
        msg - The assertion failure message.
        args - Optional message arguments.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).
